_cv._about-me: Born in 1992 (Anhui, China). Senior front-end engineer. Experienced in back-end engineering/game development. Versatile, creative, efficient, and adaptive developer. Fast learner, curious. Interested in games, math, computer science, AI, etc.

exp1.title: Lead Front-end Engineer
exp1.content:
• Played a major part in developing main B2B product AnyBot™ using vanilla JavaScript/SCSS/PHP.
  • Singlehandedly created AnyBot™ App using React Native.
  • Singlehandedly created Anyhook™ Chatbot using Vue.js.
  • Wrote documentations for products and APIs.
  • In charge of front-end developer training.

exp2.title: Fullstack Engineer
exp2.content:
• HTML5 game development using phaser/PIXI.
  • Web development using bootstrap/jQuery/React.js/SCSS.
  • Back-end development using Node.js/Java associated with MySQL.
  • Image processing using PhotoShop.

exp3.institution: G-bits Network Technology Xiamen Co., Ltd.
exp3.title: Game Designer/Developer
exp3.content:
• Designed & developed HTML5/mobile games with Unity/Phaser.
  • Third party API(Wechat, QQ, etc) implementation.

_cv._achievement:
• Has more than 10k reputation on StackOverflow by answering questions.
  • Has 100+ followers on CodePen and has multiple popular pens with hundreds of likes.
  • Has around 100 followers on GitHub and multiple repositories with over 100 stars.
  • Participated in several open source projects with post requests being merged.
  • Created a Chrome extension called Twitch Chat Danmaku, has 10k+ weekly users with ranting of 4.5+ stars.
  • Created an indie multiplayer game called the WTFGame(2016) with thousands of players online at the same time.
